name: Neighbor Wars
description:
Neighbor Wars is a game where two neighbors just can't stand each other, so they go to war. The battle is taking place in their backyard where they are throwing all kinds of things over the fence from their backyard to their neighbor's.  After time has run out, the one with the most junk in his yard loses.

Team members:
Nauris Blumbahs - main programmer/game designer
Raivo Vegners - programming/3D modeling and animation/level design
Margarita Kasatkina - art/3D modeling/UI design/level design
